text: Kare wa itta. `Anata gataga, sake gatai shogai ni torikakoma reta baai no soto kanarazu kare o tsurete modoru to, arra ni kakete yakusoku shinai kagiri, watashi wa kare o anata gata to issho ni kesshite yaranaidearou.' Koshite kare-ra ga kare ni genshuku ni chikatta toki, kare wa itta. `Arra wa, watashi-tachi no itta koto no kanshi-sha de ara reru
